column4: am i the only one with a huge regression with how dvd drives operate? right now it is repeatedly scanning for a disc that isn't there, and won't read dvds (but other discs it will). this is across other distros and hardware as well.
- sounds like a bad dvd drive
it sure does, but other machines have the same problem
- what's the same on the different machines?  the same model dvd drive?  perhaps a bad disc that was used in the different drives that  scratched the lenses?
